input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product specification information.

Product specification:
DG Performance 04-4103 - RCM Steel Exhaust (Black) for Yamaha Tri-Moto 225 (1983-1986 )

Product features:
RCM - Great performance and phenominal value!
The midpipe diameter and gets larger as it gets to the muffler body to help scavenge exhaust gases from the engine and increase power
Better throttle response and a smoother power delivery
RCM stands for Reverse Cone Megaphone.
Steel construction

Product description:
input_text.Response A: With the RCM Steel Exhaust for Yamaha Tri-Moto 225, you can expect performance and value like no other. Featuring a steel construction and a reverse cone megaphone, this exhaust is designed to enhance throttle response and smooth out the delivery of power. The midpipe diameter increases as it gets to the muffler body, helping to scavenge exhaust gases for better performance. You can rest assured that this exhaust is built to last, with a durable steel construction that can withstand the test of time.
input_text.Response B: This DG Performance RCM Steel Exhaust is the perfect way to give your Yamaha Tri-Moto 225 that extra kick. Made from steel, this exhaust system is designed to withstand the toughest conditions and provide you with years of reliable performance. The reverse cone megaphone design not only looks great, but it also helps to improve your bike's power and torque. And the best part? The midpipe diameter gets larger as it gets to the muffler body, helping to scavenge exhaust gases from the engine and increase power even further. So if you're looking for a durable and effective exhaust system that will give you better throttle response and a smoother power delivery, look no further than the DG Performance RCM Steel Exhaust.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Option B is more colloquial and sounds more persuasive to me. Its also more complex but I feel that this is to its credit and it makes the description sound more appealing.
